item.description:
ZILI MISIK

Word, Dance and Misik:

A Spiritual Celebration

________________

Saturday, February 5th

The show goes from 10:00pm to 2:00am

At The Beehive in Boston. I don't think there is any cover charge.

Check out the Beehive Event Page:

http://www.beehiveboston.com/calendar/events/index.php?com=detail&eID=1437
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet up at the area as you come in before they seat you between 9pm and 9:30pm
item.why: I hear all great things about this group, and I've wanted to see them a couple times before, but something had always come up. This time I will be there and decided to make it a meetup. Sorry for the short notice, but come out and enjoy!
item.name: See Zili Misik at The Beehive
